title: Spacebar - Temporary Unlock.
body:
Unlocked screen - hold spacebar for temporary lock.

Why isn't the reverse true?

replies.body:
I do this, I unlock and lock with the spacebar. Although I stay in locked 80% of the time, using unlocked still has its advantages.

I personally like it that it is toggleable. Now if only Target Champions was toggleable.

> [{quoted}](name=Rav,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HZodATXF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2014-12-22T08:42:00.267+0000)
>
> I do this, I unlock and lock with the spacebar. Although I stay in locked 80% of the time, using unlocked still has its advantages.
> 
> I personally like it that it is toggleable. Now if only Target Champions was toggleable.

So you hold spacebar for 80% of the time every game? ._.

Topkek no. Good way to get CTS.

You can rebind Y to be the spacebar. I press the spacebar once and it goes unlocked, I press it again to lock it.

Go into the rebinding options and mess around, can improve your play. Rebind QWER to YOL0 or SWAG. Freelo included.

But that makes it a toggle, I dun wan toggle, I want holdy.

And rebinding to yolo means you w and r at the same time lcs strats leaked.

Notice how I typed YOL0 in my post before. The second circle is a zero (number). First one is the letter.

Thank you Boards for a great font. 

For the camera, you could probably make a macro in autohotkey. Not sure if it's allowed in game though...
I don't get why you'd rather permalock it and then temporarily unlock it from time to time...personally I would never have it locked and then lock it from time to time...

I can't play with an unlocked screen at all.

I have to have it locked.

If spacebar unlocked it temporarily, I could get used to it over time without ♥♥♥♥ing up the next forty games I play because I'm struggling to get used to it.

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HZodATXF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-22T03:06:31.451+0000)
>
> Wot u on about

When the screen is unlocked, while you hold spacebar the screen is locked.

When the screen is locked, the spacebar does nothing. I want it to, when held, unlock the screen.
There is no reason why anyone would want to do this. It wouldn't be that hard to make it happen yourself though.
